name: Config 2022 What Makes Collaboration Click
description: When people with different areas of expertise come together to solve a problem, it can feel absolutely magical. Diverse perspectives unlock novel ideas that no individual could have on their own. But collaboration doesn't always seem to flourish, so where does it go wrong? And how can we improve collaboration when it’s less than ideal? The Figma Research Team has been diving deep into these questions and, in this talk, we’ll be sharing what we’ve learned about the collaborative behaviors and mindsets of the most successful teams.
